snippet: Seven Colombians accused of involvement in the stabbing death of a United States drug agent were handed over to American authorities on Tuesday at a police base in Bogotá.
abstract: Seven Colombians accused of involvement in the stabbing death of United States drug agent James Watson are handed over to American authorities at a police base in Bogota.
lead_paragraph: Seven Colombians accused of involvement in the stabbing death of a United States drug agent were handed over to American authorities on Tuesday at a police base in Bogotá.

headline.main: Colombia: Suspects in Killing of DEA Agent Handed to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Colombia: Suspects in Killing of D.E.A. Agent Handed to U.S.
